effect.en: Put 2 damage counters on 1 of your opponent’s Pokémon.
effect.fr: Placez 2 marqueurs de dégât sur l’un des Pokémon de votre adversaire.

effect.en: The Defending Pokémon is now Asleep and Poisoned.
effect.fr: Le Pokémon Défenseur est maintenant Endormi et Empoisonné.

description.en: Its tongue is made of gas. If licked, its victim starts shaking constantly until death eventually comes.
